revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #06 Zanama (Leppa) |image = [[File:Leppa.png]] |caption = Crece más despacio que otras bayas, como por ejemplo la [[Cheri|Zreza]]. Cuanto más pequeña, más sabrosa. |growtime = 4m |harvest = 7 bayas |replant = 50% |points = 10 |flavor =
*10 picante *0 seco *10 dulce *10 amargo *10 ácido }} '''Zanama (Leppa)''' es un tipo de [[Berries|baya]] que puede ser plantada en la [[Farm|Granja]] para obtener [[Farming Points|Puntos de Granja]]. Se puede obtener como recomensa aleatoria al derrotar Pokémon salvajes en las rutas.
{| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 1 mins 40 secs || 2 mins || 2 mins 20 secs || 4 mins - 8 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:LeppaTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:LeppaTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:LeppaTreeBerry.png|50px]] |}
{| class="wikitable collapsible" | style="text-align: center;" |+ Ripening Time with Modifiers ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time |- ! None | 4 mins -
8 mins |- ! Sprayduck | 2 mins 40 secs -
5 mins 20 secs |}
== Flow Chart == [[File:Leppa_Flow_Chart.png|100px]]
==Uses== ===Mutations===
Leppa berries can be used to mutate the following berries.
{| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |- ! Used In !! With |- | [[File:Razz.png|20px]] [[Razz]] || [[File:Cheri.png|20px]] [[Cheri]] |- | [[File:Bluk.png|20px]] [[Bluk]] || [[File:Chesto.png|20px]] [[Chesto]] |- | [[File:Lum.png|20px]] [[Lum]] || [[File:Cheri.png|20px]] [[Cheri]]
[[File:Chesto.png|20px]] [[Chesto]]
[[File:Pecha.png|20px]] [[Pecha]]
[[File:Rawst.png|20px]] [[Rawst]]
[[File:Aspear.png|20px]] [[Aspear]]
[[File:Oran.png|20px]] [[Oran]]
[[File:Sitrus.png|20px]] [[Sitrus]] |- | [[File:Cornn.png|20px]] [[Cornn]] || [[File:Bluk.png|20px]] [[Bluk]]
[[File:Wiki.png|20px]] [[Wiki]] |- |}
==Acquisition== ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Berries}} {{LootItem|Rock Tunnel|Common}} {{LootItem|Berry Forest|Common}} {{LootItem|Ruins of Alph|Common}} |} |}

{{Infobox Berry |name = #06 Zanama (Leppa) |image = [[File:Leppa.png]] |caption = Crece más despacio que otras bayas, como por ejemplo la [[Cheri|Zreza]]. Cuanto más pequeña, más sabrosa. |growtime = 4m |harvest = 7 bayas |replant = 50% |points = 10 |flavor =
*10 picante *0 seco *10 dulce *10 amargo *10 ácido }}
'''Leppa''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]] to obtain [[Farming Points|Farm Points]]. It can be obtained as a random drop by defeating wild Pokémon on routes.
{| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 1 mins 40 secs || 2 mins || 2 mins 20 secs || 4 mins - 8 mins |- ! Animation |

[[File:LeppaTreeBerry.png|50px]] |}

8 mins |- ! Sprayduck | 2 mins 40 secs -
5 mins 20 secs |}
== Flow Chart == [[File:Leppa_Flow_Chart.png|100px]]
==Uses== ===Mutations===
Leppa berries can be used to mutate the following berries.
{| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |- ! Used In !! With |- | [[File:Razz.png|20px]] [[Razz]] || [[File:Cheri.png|20px]] [[Cheri]] |- | [[File:Bluk.png|20px]] [[Bluk]] || [[File:Chesto.png|20px]] [[Chesto]] |- | [[File:Lum.png|20px]] [[Lum]] || [[File:Cheri.png|20px]] [[Cheri]]
